content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'lake_vyadls_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [lake_vyadls_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://vyadls.dfs.core.windows.net/lake', 
	)
Go


IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDeltaFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDeltaFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.covidimport
 WITH (
     LOCATION = 'covid_external',
     DATA_SOURCE = [lake_vyadls_dfs_core_windows_net],  
     FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat] 
 )  
 AS
 SELECT *
 FROM OPENROWSET(
     BULK 'https://vyadls.dfs.core.windows.net/lake/covid',
     FORMAT = 'Delta')  as f;
    


CREATE or ALTER VIEW dbo.covid_view AS 
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://vyadls.dfs.core.windows.net/lake/covid',
        FORMAT='DELTA'
    ) AS [result]

Go

select * from dbo.covid_view
